short_summary: Request for Standing Offer for vehicle hardware products
description: PWGSC, on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is issuing this request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the acquisition of hardware products for vehicle located in Valcartier, Qu\u00e9bec, Canada, as detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### **Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Vehicle Hardware Products**

**Issued by:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND)

**Tender Reference Number:** WS4026065994

**English Title:** Standing Offer for Vehicle Hardware Products - Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

**French Title:** Offres à commande pour produits de quincaillerie pour véhicule - Demande d'offre à commandes individuelle régionale (OCIR)

#### Tender Details

* **Publication Date:** May 29, 2023
* **Closing Date:** July 11, 2023 (14:00:00 EST)
* **Location:** Quebec (except National Capital Region)

#### Notice Type and Method

* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RFO)
* **Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Goods or Services Required
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a Standing Offer for the acquisition of vehicle hardware products at a location in Valcartier, Quebec, Canada.

#### Conditions for Participation

* **Eligibility:** Suppliers interested in participating in the Standing Offer must meet the requirements outlined in the RFP.
* **Bidding Process:** A competitive process will be used to select the successful bidder.

#### Important Dates

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** July 15, 2023
* **Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16420164?extsite=MTY0MjAxNjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16420164?extsite=MTY0MjAxNjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Renée-Ann Therien, PSPC/SPAC (she/her)
* **Contact Email:** [reneé-ann.therien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:reneé-ann.therien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Notice of Amendment
Amendment 2 has been issued on June 23, 2023. The modification includes changes to [Detailed List of Changes].

#### Tender Status

* **Status:** **Expired** (Note: This tender has closed,
